com.fasterxml.storemate.store

Interface StoreOperationCallback<OUT>

  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - Type of return value

    public interface StoreOperationCallback<OUT>
    Interface that defines callback used for operations (usually of form "GET,modify,PUT") against store.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OUT perform(long operationTime, StorableKey key, Storable value)
      Callback method called with context.

    • Method Detail

      • perform

        OUT perform(long operationTime,
          StorableKey key,
          Storable value)
            throws IOException,
                   StoreException
        Callback method called with context.
        Parameters:
        operationTime - Start time of operation
        key - Key of entry being modified
        value - Optional value related to operation
        Returns:
        Return value from operation, if any
        Throws:
        IOException
        StoreException
